entry.title: Week in Ethereum News July 2, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links PoW switch off (the Merge) The second of three public testnets to merge will occur next week, with Sepolia to turn off PoW forever sometime between Saturday and Wednesday, depending on hashpower Mainnet-shadow-fork-8 merges July 5 Mainnet execution layer Gray Glacier upgrade (delay difficulty bomb) successful; One block on wrong chain,

entry.title: Week in Ethereum News June 25, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links PoW switch off (the Merge) Mainnet-shadow-fork-7 merged with caveats: known Besu concurrency issue and Erigon issue with shadow forks Mainnet execution layer Update your nodes for Gray Glacier upgrade Latest core devs call video. Notes from Tim Beiko and Christine Kim: Sepolia testnet merge planned for July 6 Mainnet shadow fork

entry.title: Week in Ethereum News June 18, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links PoW switch off (the Merge) Merge readiness checklist for solo stakers & staking providers Mainnet-shadow-fork-7 merges June 22, equal client split, test fixes deployed on Ropsten Sepolia testnet permissioned beacon chain genesis June 20 Mainnet execution layer Gray Glacier upgrade on block 15,050,000 (around June 29) to delay difficulty bomb by

entry.title: Week in Ethereum News June 11, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links PoW switch off (the Merge) Ropsten testnet merge a major success: ~99% participation & proposal rates after config fixes & reboots some client pairs proposing empty blocks Latest core devs call video. Notes from Tim Beiko: Testnets: Sepolia merge in 3 weeks, Goerli merge in 6 weeks Difficulty bomb to be

entry.title: Week in Ethereum News June 4, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links PoW switch off (the Merge) Ropsten testnet is ready to turn off PoW forever with TTD set Tool to predict TTD arrival Stakers/nodes must manually override TTD in latest client release Manual override is useful practice in case of miner hijinx on mainnet Guides on running Ropsten nodes or specifically a
